oai_dc:dc.dc:title: G-theory of root stacks and equivariant K-theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dhillon, A.
Kobyzev, I.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
Mathematics - K-Theory and Homology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Using the description of the category of quasi-coherent sheaves on a root stack given in the paper of N. Borne and A. Vistoli, we study the G-theory of root stacks via localisation methods. We apply our results to the study of equivairiant K-theory of algebraic varieties under certain conditions.
Comment: An unnecessary hypothesis from the first version was removed. Typos were fixed
